9// Define DT_VIRTUAL_QUERYFILTER if you wish to derive a custom filter from dtQueryFilter.
10// On certain platforms indirect or virtual function call is expensive. The default
11// setting is to use non-virtual functions.
12//#define DT_VIRTUAL_QUERYFILTER 1
13
14// The data type used to index nodes when doing path queries. If you are doing very large
15// queries you might need to change this to unsigned int and pass a higher node count to
16// dtNavMeshQuery.
17typedef unsigned short dtNodeIndex;
